Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 2nd overall pick, by Boston in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/27/2016, off Alonso Maestas (SLB)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/1/2016, off Jordon Tookes (KC)...
Injured on 9/25/2016 with a Fractured Ankle, out for 3 weeks...
Won Rookie of the Year in 2016, hitting .282 with 14 HR, 71 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/8/2017, hitting .476 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
